thread.title: EVCOM Live Awards entry deadline extended until 8th October
thread.title_full: EVCOM Live Awards entry deadline extended until 8th October

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: EVCOM Live Awards entry deadline extended until 8th October
text:
EVCOM Live Awards entry deadline extended until 8th October EVCOM Live Awards entry deadline extended until 8th October Details Category: Awards   11:00 EVCOM Live Awards 2015, honouring this year’s greatest and most memorable live and experiential events, has extended the Call for Entry deadline until 5.00pm Thursday 8th October. With summer now coming to a close, this deadline extension allows participants additional time to prepare a winning entry. Final submissions will be accepted up until 5pm, with judging swiftly commencing the following day. Therefore, please note this deadline is absolute and will not be extended further. 
All EVCOM Live Awards 2015 entries will be judged by a specialist jury, comprised of commissioners and experienced events practitioners, making for one of the most diverse and influential juries the Association has hosted in recent times. With 26 categories covering all genres, the EVCOM Live Awards 2015 are the ultimate industry accolade, proving credibility with clients and delivering invaluable PR and marketing collateral. An EVCOM Live Award undoubtedly establishes its winner as a pioneering, industry leader. Successful nominees will be announced in early November ahead of a lively awards ceremony on Friday 20th November at the magnificent Olympia London. With a new name and new venue, this year’s Live Awards will be a whole new EVCOM experience with many surprises in store on the night. Related articles
